results.name: Difference between legs of primitive Pythagorean triangles sorted first on hypotenuse, then long leg.
link: Ray Chandler, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: A[s_Integer] := With[{s6 = StringPadLeft[ToString[s], 6, "0"]}, Cases[ Import["https://oeis.org/A" <> s6 <> "/b" <> s6 <> ".txt", "Table"], {_, _}][[All, 2]]];
